name: generic_scene_graph
description: An attempt to make a scene graph that is easy to understand and use, and decoupled from the rendering technology

scripts.config-debug: del-cli build/`hostname`/Debug   && make-dir build/`hostname`/Debug   && cd build/`hostname`/Debug   && cmake ../../.. -DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE=ON -DGENERIC_SCENE_GRAPH_BUILD_TESTS=ON -DGENERIC_SCENE_GRAPH_ENABLE_CODE_COVERAGE=ON -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug   -G Ninja
scripts.config-release: del-cli build/`hostname`/Release && make-dir build/`hostname`/Release && cd build/`hostname`/Release && cmake ../../.. -DCMAKE_VERBOSE_MAKEFILE=ON -DGENERIC_SCENE_GRAPH_BUILD_TESTS=ON -DGENERIC_SCENE_GRAPH_ENABLE_CODE_COVERAGE=ON -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -G Ninja
scripts.watch-debug: watch "npm run clear && npm run build-debug   && npm run test-debug"   ./ --filter=./watch_filter.js
scripts.watch-release: watch "npm run clear && npm run build-release && npm run test-release" ./ --filter=./watch_filter.js

author: Perry L Miller IV
